content: **love granny crochet zipper pouch** love granny is a free crochet pattern for a zipper pouch made from heart granny squares combining crochet and simple sewing techniques the project is designed to be approachable while resulting in a practical well-finished object **pattern description** the pouch is constructed from 12 heart granny squares joined into a rectangular panel finished with a simple border then folded and sewn to form a pouch a 30 cm zipper is added along with an optional fabric lining for a clean and durable interior gauge gauge is not critical for this project however consistency between squares is important make sure all squares are blocked to the same size before assembly **materials** - cotton yarn recommended for structure and durability - 3 mm crochet hook - scissors and tapestry needle - 30 cm / 12 in zipper - fabric for optional lining - sewing needle and thread or sewing machine **skill level** beginner to intermediate **format** written instructions and charts english us terms **free pdf download** if you need help while working on the pattern feel free to get in touch happy crocheting
